apptext.appdescription: Welcome to the KitchenAid Qualifier tool!
apptext.oneLastStep: One Last Step: Adjust your price to find your perfect
apptext.changeYourAnswer: Click on an icon to change your answer

text.question: What can we help you find?
Which product would you like to explore first?
WHAT SIZE OF COOKTOP DO YOU NEED?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Size?
text.explanation: Our cooktops come in different sizes, we want to make sure that we recommend the perfect one for your space.

text.question: HOW WOULD YOU DESCRIBE YOUR KITCHEN'S STYLE?
text.explanation_title: WHY ARE YOU ASKING ME ABOUT STYLE?
text.explanation: Our cooktops come in different styles. By understanding your preference, we can better recommend the perfect one for you.

text.question: WHEN SHOPPING FOR A COOKTOP, WHAT FEATURES ARE MOST IMPORTANT TO YOUR PURCHASE DECISION?
text.sub_question: DRAG TO REORDER. 1 IS MOST IMPORTANT AND 5 IS LEAST
text.explanation_title: WHY ARE YOU ASKING ME ABOUT PREFERENCE?
text.explanation: By understanding your cooking priorities, we can better recommend the perfect cooktop for your lifestyle.

text.question: WHAT COOKING TECHNIQUES DO YOU USE OFTEN?
text.explanation_title: WHY ARE YOU ASKING ME ABOUT COOKING TECHNIQUES?
text.explanation: Our cooktops are equipped with heat technology to go from simmer to rolling boil quickly. By understanding how you cook, we can better recommend the perfect cooktop for your lifestyle.

text.question: Is your kitchen equipped for gas or electric?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Gas?
text.explanation: Some kitchens are equipped for gas and others are not. We need to know this information to recommend the perfect range.

text.question: WHAT IS THE WIDTH OF YOUR COOKTOP OR RANGE?
text.explanation_title: WHY ARE YOU ASKING ME ABOUT WIDTH?
text.explanation: When it comes to cooktops, size matters. It is only once we know the width of your cooktop/range we can find the best vent for you.

text.question: WHERE IN YOUR KITCHEN CAN WE FIND YOUR COOKING SURFACE?
text.explanation_title: WHY ARE YOU ASKING ME WHERE I COOK?
text.explanation: We know that every kitchen is unique. By understanding where your cooking surface is, we can recommend the perfect vent.

text.question: ARE THERE CABINETS ABOVE YOUR COOKING SURFACE?
text.explanation_title: WHY ARE YOU ASKING ME ABOUT MY CABINETS?
text.explanation: Some of the by-products of cooking (steam, moisture and grease) can be destructive without the right ventilation. By understanding your specific needs we can find the perfect system for your kitchen.

text.question: DO YOU OFTEN FIND YOURSELF PREPARING A HIGH-HEAT SAUCE, SAUTÉ OR STIR-FRY?
text.explanation_title: WHY ARE YOU ASKING ME ABOUT HEAT?
text.explanation: We know that everybody has a different cooking style. If you like to turn up the heat, we’ll find you a vent with a stronger fan.

text.question: DOES YOUR VENTILATION LEAD TO YOUR HOME EXTERIOR?
text.explanation_title: WHY ARE YOU ASKING ME ABOUT VENTILATION?
text.explanation: As much as we want to maintain the smell of that simmering pot of soup, proper ventilation is important to keep kitchen air clean.

text.question: DO YOU EVER FORGET TO TURN ON YOUR FAN?
text.explanation_title: WHY ARE YOU ASKING ME ABOUT MY HABITS?
text.explanation: Some of our vents are automatic which means if you need us to, we can give you a hand turning it on.

text.question: WOULD YOU LIKE YOUR HOOD TO HAVE A WARMING LAMP?
text.explanation_title: WHY ARE YOU ASKING ME ABOUT A WARMING LAMP?
text.explanation: Some of our models come equipped with warming lamps. If we have a better idea of your needs, we can better recommend the perfect hood.

text.question: WHAT SIZE OF WALL OVEN DO YOU NEED?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Size?
text.explanation: Our wall ovens come in different sizes, we want to make sure that we recommend the perfect one for your space.

text.question: WHAT PREFERENCE DO YOU HAVE FOR YOUR WALL OVEN?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about orientation?
text.explanation: Our wall ovens come in different orientation options. We want to get a better idea of your preference so that we can recommend the perfect one for your home.

text.question: I use my oven to...
text.explanation_title: WHY ARE YOU ASKING ME ABOUT COOKING?
text.explanation: Our wall ovens all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use yours so we can recommend the perfect one for your needs.

answers.text: Cook meals for my busy family
Help me host parties and cook multi-course meals
Bake, bake, and bake some more

text.question: HOW WOULD YOUR FRIENDS DESCRIBE YOU?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Cooking?
text.explanation: Our wall ovens all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use it so we can recommend the perfect wall oven for your cooking needs.

answers.text: A baker – I’m usually covered in flour
A home chef – scallop ceviche and naan pizzas, I love trying new recipes
I’m both – I should probably start my own food blog
I’m neither – my stack of take-out menus is impressive

text.question: Is being energy efficient important to your family?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Energy?
text.explanation: All of our machines are different, just like the families they're for. If we can understand your energy usage, then we can better recommend the perfect wall oven to fit your needs.

text.question: Is being energy efficient important to your family?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Energy?
text.explanation: All of our machines are different, if we can understand your energy use we can find a machine that meets your specific lifestyle needs.

text.question: How often do you find yourself needing extra space in your oven?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Capacity?
text.explanation: If you cook large meals often, then we recommend an oven with a larger capacity.

text.question: Why do you cook?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Cooking?
text.explanation: Our ranges all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use it so we can recommend the perfect one for your needs.

answers.text: From Sunday roasts to pasta night, my family depends on me to make dinner
From birthday parties to family holidays, I need a range that can handle cakes and feasts for a crowd
Because I’m always trying new dishes for my family, I need a range that can handle variety
Cook? We’re more of a take-out family with an impressive collection of frozen foods

text.question: How would your family describe you?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Cooking?
text.explanation: Our ranges all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use it so we can recommend the perfect one for your needs.

answers.text: "Someone that cooks because they have to"

text.question: I use my range to...
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Cooking?
text.explanation: Our ovens all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use it so we can recommend the perfect wall oven for your cooking needs.

answers.text: Cook meals for my busy family
Help me host parties and cook multi-course meals
Bake, bake, and bake some more
Whip up a high temperature stir-fry

text.question: Is your kitchen equipped for gas or electric?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Gas?
text.explanation: Some kitchens are equipped for gas and others are not. We need to know this information to recommend the perfect range.

text.question: Is being energy efficient important to your family?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about energy?
text.explanation: All of our machines are different, just like the families they're for. If we can understand your energy usage, then we can better recommend the perfect one to fit your needs.

text.question: We've got the perfect fridge for your family.
text.question_more: Just tell us how much space you have to fill.
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Size?
text.explanation: Our fridges come in many sizes, we want to make sure that we recommend the perfect one for your space.

text.question: On a regular basis, I depend on my fridge to feed...
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Capacity?
text.explanation: We want to get a better idea of how you use your fridge and what you put in it so we can find you the one that fits your lifestyle.

text.question: I need a fridge for my family that can…
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Organization?
text.explanation: Our fridges are carefully designed from the inside out. By better learning how you use your fridge, it will help us choose the right fridge for your lifestyle.

answers.text: Keep the drinks cold - from milk to fruit juice, pop to iced tea and everything in between
Hold our ready-to-eat prepared meals - we’re always on the go
Be our personal grocery store - all ten aisles in one place
Store lots of food for birthdays, team celebrations and BBQs

text.question: You wake up thirsty in the middle of the night, so you grab...
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Water?
text.explanation: Some of our fridge models provide water dispensing features. By understanding how you consume water, we can suggest a fridge that will best suit your needs.

answers.text: A nice, cold bottle of water
A drink from our water cooler
A glass of milk or juice

text.question: I like to add ice to...
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Ice?
text.explanation: Some of our fridge models provide ice dispensing features. By understanding how you consume ice, we can better match a fridge to your lifestyle.

text.question: For the most part, your family’s fridge is...
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About organization?
text.explanation: After assessing your technique we can suggest ways to optimize organization for your home.

text.question: I choose form over function...
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Style?
text.explanation: Since some fridges are built deeper than typical counter depth, we need to know how important having a fridge that's in-line with your counters is to your purchasing decision.

answers.text: Always - Home aesthetics are very important to me
Sometimes - I like to balance form and function
Function - Performance is my main priority

text.question: How do you shop for your groceries?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Ask Me About Groceries?
text.explanation: Our fridges are designed with unique features. By understanding how you shop, we learn more about how you use your fridge and can better recommend the perfect one for your lifestyle.

answers.text: I’m on a first-name basis at the farmers’ market
I go aisle-to-aisle at the grocery store and always fill my cart
I visit the grocery store but stick to the perimeter to get the basics
The frozen food aisle is my second home

text.question: What would we find inside your dishwasher right now?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me what I wash?
text.explanation: Knowing what goes into your dishwasher will allow us to recommend an option that ensures every dish gets a fresh start.

answers.text: Wine glasses from all my closest friends
Cutting boards of every shape and size
Place settings from our family dinner

text.question: How many times a week do you run the dishwasher?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Capacity?
text.explanation: When it comes to washing your dishes there is no job too big or too small. Understanding what goes into your dishwasher will allow us to find the perfect fit for you.

text.question: WHEN SHOPPING FOR A DISHWASHER, WHAT FEATURES ARE MOST IMPORTANT TO YOUR PURCHASE DECISION?
text.sub_question: DRAG TO REORDER. 1 IS MOST IMPORTANT AND 6 IS LEAST
text.explanation_title: WHY ARE YOU ASKING ME ABOUT PREFERENCE?
text.explanation: By understanding your dishwashing priorities, we can better recommend a dishwasher with features that suit your lifestyle.

text.question: HOW IMPORTANT IS ENERGY EFFICIENCY TO YOUR HOUSEHOLD?
text.explanation_title: Why Are You Asking Me About Energy?
text.explanation: All of our machines use energy differently. By understanding your energy use, it will help us find the machine that best fits your lifestyle.

text.question: When do you run your dishwasher?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about start time?
text.explanation: Much like each of your guests, dishwashers have different sound profiles. By understanding your start time we can determine which machine suits you best.

answers.text: Before I head out in the morning

text.question: Do you live in an open concept space?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about my space?
text.explanation: If you live in an open concept space, we want to take that into consideration to recommend the perfect machine to keep the noise at a minimum.

answers.text: Yes - My kitchen opens on to another room
No - My kitchen is its own room

text.question: Before running our dishwasher it is...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about organization?
text.explanation: After assessing your technique we can suggest ways to optimize organization for your home.

text.question: Select your style:
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about style?
text.explanation: Finding the perfect fit for your home's style is as important for us as it is for you.
